task.title: Removing the Sametime Meetings Add-in
task.shortdesc: The uninstall the Sametime meetings add-in, users must remove the custom add-in the users added to Microsoft outlook.

step.cmd: Navigate to your My add-in window. Click the Get add-ins icon located in the task bar.
On the Add-ins for Outlook window, click My Add-ins.
step.info: The Sametime Meetings add-in is located in Custom Addins section.

step.cmd: Click the Manage Add-in icon (within the Sametime Meeting tile and select Remove.

image.alt: User interface showing Sametime add-in tile and remove function
